items.title: Saudi’s Zahid to Reopen Talks With Barloworld’s Shareholders
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Saudi Arabia’s Zahid Group will start fresh negotiations with the shareholders of South Africa’s Barloworld Ltd., after an initial acquisition offer was rejected. items.title: Hydraulic Tiltrotator Market to Reach USD 1,666.26 Million by 2032, Growing at 7.2% CAGR: IMR Market Reports Reveals Industry Outlook
items.author: Imr Market Reports
items.description: The global hydraulic tiltrotator market is expected to grow significantly, driven by the demand for precision in excavation, infrastructure projects, and utility work. Key players are focused on innovation, improving efficiency, and reducing labor costs. Growth is fueled by urbanization, automation trends, and rising construction activities, with Europe and North America leading in adoption and technological advancements.
